actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend the temporary duty suspension for certain articles.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on: (1) 1,1-Bis(4-chlorophenyl)-2,2,2-trichloroethanol (dicofol); (2) dinocap; (3) m-hydroxy-benzoic acid; (4) 3-amino-3-methyl-1-butyne; (5) 2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one, and mixtures of 2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and application adjuvants; (6) 3,7-bis(dimethylamino) phenazathionium chloride (methylene blue); (7) mixtures of dinocap and application adjuvants; (8) maneb, zineb, mancozeb, and metiram; (9) mixtures of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one, 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one, magnesium chloride and stabilizers, whether or not containing application adjuvants; (10) mixtures of 1,1-bis(4-chlorophenyl)-2,2,2-trichloroethanol (dicofol) and application adjuvants; (11) cross-linked polyvinylbenzyltrimethylammonium chloride (cholestyramine resin USP); and (12) molten-salt-cooled acrylic acid reactors and their associated parts, accessories and equipment, when imported as an entirety.

titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary duty suspension for certain articles.
